verses.roman:
keho kahe, kṛṣṇa sākṣāt nara-nārāyaṇa
keho kahe, kṛṣṇa haya sākṣāt vāmana

synonyms: keho kahe—someone says; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sākṣāt—directly; nara-nārāyaṇa—Lord Nara-Nārāyaṇa; keho kahe—someone says; kṛṣṇa haya—Kṛṣṇa is; sākṣāt vāmana—Lord Vāmanadeva.
translation: Some said that Kṛṣṇa was directly Lord Nara-Nārāyaṇa, and some called Him Lord Vāmanadeva incarnate.
